All functions

INBO.colours()

A colour pallet according the INBO style guide version <= 2014.

INBOblue

Colour according to the INBO style guide version <= 2014

INBOtheme-package

Package with several ggplot2 themese

theme_INBO()

This function was removed from INBOtheme

demo_palette()

Demonstrate colours in a palette

ggsave.latex

Sla een ggplot2 object op en genereert de nodige LaTeX code

inbo.2015.colours()

A colour pallet according the INBO style guide version >= 2015.

inbo.hoofd

Colour according to the INBO style guide version >= 2015

.onLoad()

Set theme_inbo2015 as default on loading the package

page.height

Standard dimensions for the Elsevier style guide

percentcolor()

Make a colour lighter

switchColour()

Switch the default colour of all geoms

theme_elsevier()

Theme in compliance with the style guide of Elsevier journals

theme_inbo()

The theme in compliance with the INBO style guide version >= 2015.

theme_map()

a ggplot2 theme which removes labels, ticks and titles from both axes.

theme_vlaanderen2015()

The theme in compliance with the Vlaanderen style guide version >= 2015.

vl.yellow

Some colours for the corporate style of vlaanderen.be. Taken from level 1, and level 2 pallette 7

vlaanderen.2015.colours()

A colour pallet according the Vlaanderen style guide version >= 2015.
